message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with action recognition using visual features and semantic descriptors, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The use of word-vectors and semantic spaces also suggests a connection to natural language processing (cs.CL) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also proposes improvements to the standard zero-shot learning pipeline, which could be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM).
